official_title: A bill to amend section 607 of the Merchant Marine Act, 1936 dealing with the capital construction fund, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to define "eligible vessel" for purposes of eligibility for an operating differential subsidy. Outlines operational requirements for vessels obtaining funding from the capital construction fund.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 607 of the Merchant Marine Act, 1936 dealing with the capital construction fund, and for other purposes.
